email_body: ---------------------- Forwarded by Phillip K Allen/HOU/ECT on 03/13/2000 01:30 PM --------------------------- From: Phillip K Allen 03/13/2000 11:31 AM To: William Kelly/HOU/ECT@ECT, Steve Jackson/HOU/ECT@ECT, Brent A Price/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: Priority List Will, Here is a list of the top items we need to work on to improve the position and p&l reporting for the west desk. My underlying goal is to create position managers and p&l reports that represent all the risk held by the desk and estimate p&l with great accuracy. Let's try and schedule a meeting for this Wednesday to go over the items above. Phillip
